Sound Familiar?

If you're a spec-home builder, you know these pain points all too well

The Phone Tag Game

You spend hours every day calling and texting subs to confirm schedules. One missed message and your whole timeline falls apart.

The Domino Effect

Plumbing finishes early but inspection isn't scheduled for 5 days. Drywall crew shows up to a site that's not ready. Everyone wastes time.

The Profit Drain

Every delay day costs you money in carrying costs. Miscommunication is killing your margins on builds you should be profiting from.

33%

Poor communication causes one-third of construction projects to fail.

You can't afford to be in that statistic.

There's a better way...

‚Üì

EverBuild: Your Always-On Project Coordinator

Three simple steps to automated construction coordination

1

Set Your Timeline

Break your spec home into phases, set dates, and assign subcontractors. Takes 10 minutes.

  • Drag-and-drop phase scheduling
  • Pre-built templates for common builds
  • Assign subs in seconds

Project Timeline

65-Day Build
FoundationDay 10
FramingDay 20
PlumbingDay 30
ElectricalDay 40
DrywallDay 50
2

We Handle the Communication

EverBuild automatically texts subs 2 days before their phase starts with the address, date, and job details.

  • 98% SMS open rate
  • Customizable lead times per sub
  • Include job details and site address
Messages

EverBuild

üëã Hi Mike! Your Framing work at 123 Oak Street starts on Monday, Oct 28 at 9:00 AM.

üìç View on map

Tap to confirm: everbuild.app/s/abc123

Got it! I'll be there üëç

98% Open Rate
3

Schedules Adjust Automatically

When a sub reports a delay, the system instantly adjusts the schedule and notifies everyone affected. No phone tag required.

  • Real-time timeline updates
  • Automatic cascade to dependent phases
  • Instant notifications to affected parties

BEFORE (Original Schedule)

Plumbing
Day 10 - 15
Electrical
Day 15 - 20
Drywall
Day 20 - 25

Plumbing reported 2-day delay

AFTER (Auto-Adjusted)

Plumbing
Day 12 - 17
Electrical
Day 17 - 22
Drywall
Day 22 - 27
All affected subs notified automatically

Everything You Need, Nothing You Don't

Powerful features designed specifically for spec-home builders

Automated SMS Notifications

Subs get text reminders before their phase starts. 98% open rate means they actually see it.

Smart Schedule Adjustments

Delays in one phase automatically shift dependent phases. Everyone stays in sync.

No-Login Status Updates

Subs tap a link to report "done" or "delayed". No app download or login required.

Document Storage

Upload plans, permits, and photos. Everyone accesses the latest version from their phone.

Real-Time Dashboard

See all your active projects at a glance. Know which ones need attention today.

Communication Log

Every notification, status update, and change is logged. Proof when you need it.

Ready to streamline your construction coordination?
